topic.title: Discuss (U6): Deserts
topic.text:
OK, so deserts are dry! People often have one picture in their mind of what a desert looks like. There often are similarities. However, once you have experienced more than one, you discover that they are not all alike.

This discussion is going to be more of an open discussion; and I will chime in a few times in this thread.

  • Based on the reading, describe what you found to be most interesting about deserts?
  • Identify and describe at least two desert areas in the United States.
  • If you have experienced a desert, please share a description of what you observed and experienced; and identify the location.

Initial posts are due on Wednesday by 11:59 pm, in which you use full sentences and proper grammar.

Respond to at least two other students' posts (at a minimum), which are due on Sunday by 11:59 pm.

  • Be sure to respond to other students' posts with a substantive comment using full sentences and proper grammar.
